text:
Serie A
Fiorentina: Gilardino charmed by Ribery!
Legend of Fiorentina, Alberto Gilardino spoke about the French player Franck Ribery, who dropped his bags this summer, in the club of La Viola.
03 Nov 2019, 23:40 by Hugo Deloraine



Franck Rib√©ry charmed everyone in Italy. Author of great performances with the Viola, he convinced his coach, his teammates or even the journalists. Despite being suspended three games because of his gesture of humor towards a referee, Franck Ribery also charmed Alberto Gilardino, legend of the Viola, who spoke about him in the Corriere Fiorentino.




"They can enjoy a great player"




Gilardino + 12 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

"He's always been an incredible player, having him on the team gives you the opportunity to always be on the power play, and then he gives you the ball, he makes extraordinary passes, and see him at age 36." is a great pleasure for me, it is an exemplary professional who came to Florence with the right head and mind I am happy for Fiorentina and for the fans: they can enjoy a great player. to Rocco Commisso that he arrived in Florence. "
